image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: A Representative from Louisiana; born in Oak Grove, West Carroll Parish, La., January 7, 1974; graduated from Forest High School, Forest, La., 1992; attended, University of Louisiana, Monroe; United States Army, 1992-1994; Louisiana National Guard; business owner; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Thirteenth Congress, by special election, to fill the vacancy caused by the resignation of United States Representative Rodney Alexander (November 16, 2013-January 3, 2015); unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Fourteenth Congress in 2014.
